channel.title: Elixir Quiz
channel.description: Weekly programming problems to help you learn Elixir

item.title: Tournament Generation
item.description: [CDATA[ In this edition of Elixir Quiz, we will generate a tournament schedule for a given set of teams. ]]

item.title: Caesar Cipher
item.description: [CDATA[ In this edition of Elixir Quiz, we enctypt a piece of text using a Caesar Cipher ]]

item.title: Identicons
item.description: [CDATA[ In this edition of Elixir Quiz, we create a module that will generate Identicons for people based on their username ]]

item.title: Virtual Pet
item.description: [CDATA[ In this edition of Elixir Quiz, we create a virtual pet for us to care for. ]]

item.title: Chat server
item.description: [CDATA[ In this edition of Elixir Quiz, we create a simple chat server. ]]

item.title: Poker part 4: Playing a game
item.description: [CDATA[ In this edition of Elixir Quiz, we finish off our game of poker. This week we will tie everything together into a simple game we can play ]]

item.title: Poker part 3: Making decisions
item.description: [CDATA[ In this edition of Elixir Quiz, we continue work on our game of poker. This week we will be building a simple AI for our game ]]

item.title: Poker part 2: Finding a winner
item.description: [CDATA[ In this edition of Elixir Quiz, we continue work on our game of poker. This week we will be creating hands and comparing them ]]

item.title: Poker part 1: A deck of cards
item.description: [CDATA[ In this edition of Elixir Quiz, we start work on our first multi week project, building a game of poker ]]

item.title: Heightmap
item.description: [CDATA[ A programming challenge in which we generate a random terrain that could potentially be used in a game. ]]

item.title: Run Length Encoding
item.description: [CDATA[ A programming challenge in which we take strings of uppercase characters, and return a version that has been compressed with the Run Length Encoding algorithm ]]

item.title: FizzBuzz
item.description: [CDATA[ For our first problem, we tackle the classic interview question: FizzBuzz. ]]
